Name: Maze Trials
About the game: Maze Trials is a maze running game, find your way out of the mazes, don't forget to collect the key to unlock the exit. Features: - 100 Mazes, gradually getting larger as you progress through the levels - Find the key to escape each level - Countdown timer, if timer reaches 0 the level restarts - Hidden coins on each level to collect and add time to the timer - Map items give you a preview of the maze for a few seconds and adds time - Ability to place markers on the maze - Great background music If you beat the 100 mazes, you will unlock Maze Rankings and Random Level Selector. Earn 3 stars by: 1 - Complete the level 2 - Collect all the levels coins 3 - Complete level without collecting maps
